episodes.title: S1 Episode 0 - "Iraqnophobia" feat. H. Jon Benjamin & James Adomian
episodes.description:
Brendan and Noah drag the Iraq War out of America’s memory hole to see how it shaped our world today. Meet the rogues’ gallery of George W. Bush’s administration and Saddam Hussein’s family. Featuring special guests James Adomian and H. Jon Benjamin.
